means: 搞糟，完不成( bungle的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Two prisoners bungled an escape bid after running either side of a lamp-post while handcuffed.
sentence.Network_cn: 两名被手铐铐在一起的囚犯试图逃跑时分别往电灯杆两边跑，结果没逃掉。

PerfectNetExp.abs: a bungled performance ;, 拙劣表现;
the West Wing学习笔记 - The West Wing -... ... 16．Warden： 典狱官 17．Bungled： 办糟的，搞乱的 18．track down： 追捕到，追 …
It looks as though you bungled again ., 看来你好像又把事情搞糟了.
Germany's already acted , and bungled it .德国人已经行动了,而且弄的一团糟.

list.abs: The electrician bungled the wiring job ., 电工笨拙地做接线工作.

while the world looked on , transfixed , the terrorists held 11 Israeli athletes hostage for 21 tense hours until political bungling resulted in a deadly firefight at a local airport .恐怖分子劫特了11名以色列运动员作为人质，时间长达21小时，由于政治谈判的最终失败，在当地的一个机场爆发了一场生死枪战，全世界上民眼睁睁地看着
their pay was late because of a computer bungle .由于计算机出错，他们的工资晚发了。
bungler 笨蛋bungling fool 笨拙的傻瓜confound 可恶，活该，去死（比damn轻的骂语）.

entry.def: If you bungle something, you fail to do it properly, because you make mistakes or are clumsy.

example.ex: Two prisoners bungled an escape bid after running either side of a lamp-post while handcuffed.
example.tran: 两名被手铐铐在一起的囚犯试图逃跑时分别往电灯杆两边跑，结果没逃掉。

example.ex: ...the FBI's bungled attempt to end the 51 day siege.
example.tran: 联邦调查局为结束持续51天的围困进行的糟糕尝试

auth_sentence.content: Yes, they bungled the description on that one.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yes, they bungled the description on that one.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yes, they bungled the description on that one.

auth_sentence.content: British history is littered with bungled economic policy experiments.
auth_sentence.res_content: British history is littered with bungled economic policy experiments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: British history is littered with bungled economic policy experiments.

auth_sentence.content: Its bungled operations have killed uncounted Palestinian civilians.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its bungled operations have killed uncounted Palestinian civilians.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its bungled operations have killed uncounted Palestinian civilians.
